name: h3
description: Introducing the 2026 Victus Vibe Pro-Crayon JROD Squad Gold Drop 10 USSSA Baseball Bat, a standout choice for players seeking performance and style. This bat features a mid-balanced swing feel, offering enhanced control thanks to its ergonomic handle taper and micro-perforated soft-touch grip. Crafted with a one-piece alloy composite and boasting a 2 3/4 inch barrel diameter, the bat incorporates VXP Alloy for increased pop and extended durability. The ringless barrel construction creates a thinner, more flexible sweet spot, ensuring superior performance on the field. With a vibrant yellow and sky blue colorway and Julio Rodriguez's authentic signature on the barrel, this USSSA 1.15 BPF certified bat is perfect for players aiming to make a statement. Warranty chevron-down chevron-down chevron-down Warranty A Full Manufacturer's Warranty of 365 Days is included. If a warranty issue arises, our Bat Experts are happy to assist you in reaching the manufacturer to get a fast replacement! Begin Your Claim Here: Start My Warranty Claim
